newsitem.title: CHINA: Hong Kong hit by heavy rain, thunderstorms.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong hit by heavy rain, thunderstorms.

text.p: Hong Kong was hit by thunderstorms and heavy rain again on Wednesday as weeklong poor weather continued.
The Hong Kong Observatory said rainy spells were expected to continue into Thursday.

Hong Kong has had several spells of stormy weather over the last few days, but these caused few disruptions in either celebrations or official functions to mark its handover from Britain to China on Monday night.
